participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and has a strong appreciation for the arts.
participant_1.background: i enjoy listening to classical music. i'm a christian. my favorite color is red. i can drive a tractor. my sister is a pole dancer.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Driven and ambitious, thrives on competition, and values discipline and hard work.
participant_2.background: i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread. my favorite color is yellow. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.
